coding_standards.error_handling: Always use die() function from common.sh
coding_standards.logging: Use log(), success(), error(), warning() from common.sh
coding_standards.user_prompts: Use confirm() function with AUTO_CONFIRM support

pre_commit_checklist: Update README.md with any structural or functional changes
Verify all commands and paths in README are accurate
Update Quick Start section if entry points changed
Update Access Information if ports/credentials changed
Verify Project Structure section matches actual layout
commit_workflow.readme_maintenance: README.md must accurately reflect current state before every commit

cleanup_policy.challenge_orphaned_files: Question purpose of any file not clearly needed
cleanup_policy.evaluate_structure: Regularly suggest improvements to folder organization

notes.libwebkit_workaround: Use dpkg-query instead of dpkg | grep due to ripgrep alias
